description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing the music industry by addressing longstanding issues like copyright disputes and revenue distribution. Discover the impact of decentralization, transparency, and immutability on royalty payments, copyright management, and fan engagement.
keywords: blockchain, music industry, copyright management, royalty distribution, smart contracts, independent artists, ticketing systems, NFTs, transparency, music distribution, decentralization
title: Blockchain and the Music Industry: A Harmonious Evolution
